choices: Phillipines
South Korea
North Dakota
Sweden
Australia
1.content:
You moved to your parents old house where you live alone and are struggling to find work.

Online shopping between filling job applications online, you find a Chinese site that sells the Choker. It promises to change your life and set your life in a new direction by sending you to exotic locations. It looks like a rhinestone choker with a USB cord attached to it. You order it for a laugh as it's cheap and the shipping is free and it comes to your house quickly. All it instructs is..

Place collar around neck
Connect to internet by computer or wireless device, such as cellphone.
Install app
Open app and make selection.

You follow the steps and are confronted by just a few choices. You select one and the room glows white around you. As your vision focuses as the light fades, you look down and notices your clothes are different. Your hands are different. You're a completely different person from the neck down and now you ou have been teleported to the place you have chosen.
1.title: No life and running out of money

choices: Young Bank Accontant and aspiring anime artist
A political activist and veterinarian
A rich older socialite
A student still going to school with uniforms
A comic artist struggling to get known

info.brief_description: You order an item on the internet that semds your head but the rest of you stays behind.
info.description:
You are unemployed now that current pandemic has caused you to lose your job. Searching online for work, you find on an Asian shopping site an add for the Choker:

Gain new perspective as you are transported to another land and step into someone else's shoes.

Find new life as you make your way into a different exotic location.

You send away for the device as it was cheap and only limited quantities. Now the adventures begin.

Rules:
Don't post anything your mother would be called for, and she would call the Mental Health System to come take you away. Try to keep it with in the view of a funny comedy about your character suddenly ending up in a different place and body. Don't be graphic with sex please.
